SummaryEnglish: An MMO gamer awakens as the Black-Winged Tyrant, Lufas Maphaahl, rising from her sealed fate—only to find this is very real. Her defeat 200 years ago unleashed monsters of death, and the legend is one of terror. Now, trapped in the body of history’s most feared conqueror, he must survive a world that wants her dead…and uncover why he’s here.
Aliases: Yasei no Rasu Bosu ga Arawareta!
Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!: Kokuyoku no Haou
Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!
Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta

1.SummaryEnglish: After finishing the greatest battle in Exgate Online history, the player gets incarnated as his character.

2.SummaryEnglish: Lufas journeys to Svel and learns about what happened to the world in her 200 year absence.

3.SummaryEnglish: Aries attacks Svel, fighting Megrez and Levia before Lufas steps in to stop him.

4.TitleEnglish: They Were Pulling Strings Behind the Scenes!
4.SummaryEnglish: After beating sense into Aries, Lufas punishes the devilfolk that manipulated him and catches up with Megrez.
